camera_get_view_speed_y: This function can be used to retrieve the movement speed of the given camera along the y axis (vertical movement). The return value will be in pixels per game frame.
The unique camera ID value returned when you created the camera

{ANY_CODE} var xs = camera_get_view_speed_x(view_camera[0]);
var ys = camera_get_view_speed_y(view_camera[0]);
if xs != 5 || ys != 5
{nbsp_x4}{
{nbsp_x4}camera_set_view_speed(view_camera[0], 5, 5);
{nbsp_x4}}

The above code retrieves the xspeed and yspeed of the camera assigned to view port[0] and then checks this to see if it matches the given value. If it does not then the view camera is set to that speed.
